verses.name: Ezekiel 32:18
verses.text: Son of man, wail for the multitude of Egypt, and cast them down, even her, and the daughters of the famous nations, unto the nether parts of the earth, with them that go down into the pit.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:19
verses.text: Whom dost thou pass in beauty? go down, and be thou laid with the uncircumcised.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:20
verses.text: They shall fall in the midst of them that are slain by the sword: she is delivered to the sword: draw her and all her multitudes.
